metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9376 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Integer underflow in Ettercap 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (out-of-bounds write) and possibly execute arbitrary codevia a small (1) size variable value in the dissector_dhcp function indissectors/ec_dhcp.c, (2) length value to the dissector_gg function indissectors/ec_gg.c, or (3) string length to the get_decode_len function inec_utils.c or a request without a (4) username or (5) password to thedissector_TN3270 function in dissectors/ec_TN3270.c.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
